title: Whoa!
review: I came out of the cinema thinking 'What a horrible movie' but after reading everyone's comments I have begun to think that it was so powerful and overwhelming that I should have thought 'What a brilliant movie but what an awful lifestyle drugs inflict'I must say that as a parent, I'm glad that Darren A. made 'Requiem for a Dream' because I don't just think of junkies as people removed from me now - it is too easy for anyone to become caught!
